faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: Applied Basic Math; Modern Deep Learning Networks; Deep Learning Research
description.et: Rakenduslik matemaatika, nüüdisaegsed sügavad tehisnärvivõrgud, sügava õppe uurimismeetodid

objectives.en: To present the main concepts of the theory and practice of modern neural networks.
objectives.et: Peamisteks eemärkideks on tutvustada põhilisi mõisteid nüüdisaegsete tehisnärvivõrkude teoreetilisest kirjeldusest ja nende praktilisest rakendamisest.

objectives.en: To give students the basic understanding and tools to be able to independently apply neural networks to real problems.
objectives.et: Anname õpilasele vajalikud teoreetilised alusteadmised ning tutvustame tehisvõrkude loomiseks saadaval olevaid tööriistu. Kursuse lõpuks on õpilane võimeline iseseisvalt närvivõrke elulistele probleemidele rakendama.

learning_outcomes.en: By the end of the course the student will be able to:
- Understand the main theoretical aspects of how different types of neural networks work
learning_outcomes.et: -	tunneb erinevat tüüpi tehisnärvivõrke ja teab nende töö teoreetilisi aluspõhimõtteid

learning_outcomes.en: - Decide for which type of problems it is appropriate to apply neural networks and if so which type of neural network architecture
learning_outcomes.et: -	teab millist tüüpi probeemide lahendamiseks tehisnärvivõrke kasutada. Erinevate probleemistike puhul oskab valida sobiva tehisnärvivõrguarhitektuuri.

learning_outcomes.en: - Know the state of the art of neural network solutions to different problems in machine learning and artificial intelligence
learning_outcomes.et: -	on tuttav tehisnärvivõrkude kasutamise kuulsaimate ja edukaimate näitetega teaduse tipptasemel.  Muu hulgas teab, kuidas tehisvõrke  kasutatakse ülesannete lahendamisel masinõppe ja tehisintellekti valdkondades.

learning_outcomes.en: - Independently solve projects using neural networks
learning_outcomes.et: -	on võimeline iseseisvalt tehisnärvivõrke rakendades probleeme lahendama

learning_outcomes.en: - Use software solutions for creating and training neural networks
learning_outcomes.et: -	oskab kasutada tehisnärvivõrkude loomise ja treenimise jaoks loodud tarkvaralahendusi.

learning_outcomes.en: In general the student will be also able to evaluate and criticize current literature on state of the art neural networks
learning_outcomes.et: Üliõpilane on võimeline aru saama ja kriitiliselt hindama teadusartikleid tehisnärvivõrkude teemal.

independent_work.et: Independent work will consist in homework assignments and a final project and report. Consultation possibilities will occur during practice sessions and at any time by arranging visits with the teacher in charge.

description.et: Weekly homework in the form of small exercises and programming problems will be assigned and evaluated along the course. (30 points of the final grade).
A final practice in similar form of a homework will be conducted as a test for the practical learning of the material. (30 points of the final grade).

A project (small data analysis / simulation / or summary of a research paper) under the supervision of the teachers or members of the computational neuroscience group will be evaluated at the end of the course. (40 points of the final grade)
 For the project, the assessment criteria will include:
  - complexity of the topic and level of analysis
  -  logic and content of the written report associated to         the project
  - logic and style of presentation of the project in a small talk (10-15 minutes)
  - managing and team work (in case of the project being made in a team). Appropriate and fair distribution of the tasks, cooperative attitude, ...

grade_preconditions.et: The homeworks should be submitted on time and positively graded. At least 50% of points for each grading material (homework, project, and final practice) have to be obtained for final assessment.

grade_evaluation.et:
Final grade will depend on the final total number of points obtained from the homework assignments and project. The numerical scale for differential assessment will be:

<50 points F
>50 points E
>60 points D
>70 points C
>80 points B
>90 points A

debt_elimination.et:
Overdue work will be either penalized or not considered depending on the amount of delay. 
The final practice can be re-taken in case of not achieving 50% of points.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
